title: 87/442/EEC: Council Decision of 13 August 1987 concerning the conclusion of an Agreement in the form of an Exchange of Letters on fisheries arrangements between the European Economic Community and the Kingdom of Morocco, applicable on a preliminary basis from 1 August to 31 December 1987
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 13 August 1987
concerning the conclusion of an Agreement in the form of an Exchange of Letters on fisheries arrangements between the European Economic Community and the Kingdom of Morocco, applicable on a preliminary basis from 1 August to 31 December 1987
(87/442/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Agreement in the form of an Exchange of Letters on fisheries arrangements between the European Economic Community and the Kingdom of Morocco, applicable on a preliminary basis from 1 August to 31 December 1987, is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
This Decision shall apply from 1 August 1987.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 August 1987.
For the Council
The President
K.E. TYGESEN
(1) OJ No L 376, 31. 12. 1986, p. 112.
